page.title: 16Entertainment in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
In July and December the Primary School entertains Parents and local People with concerts in Brand Green Village Hall. A whist drive is held once a month also in the village hall.
The Village School Children visit the theatre in Cheltenham in December as part of the school Christmas Party. Apart from this, visits to a theatre by Pauntley residents are rare. Frequency of Family theatre visits are:- Never 34, Rarely 19, Once a year 11, Twice a year 10 and the remainder more than three times a year.
Visits to the Cinema vary from :- weekly (4), to once every four years (9).
